au.gov.sbr.signing
Class Signer

java.lang.Object
  au.gov.sbr.signing.Signer
Direct Known Subclasses:
NullSigner, STSSigner
public abstract class Signer
extends java.lang.Object

A facade for creating a signed SOAP Envelope suitable for submission to SBR from a String or DOM representation of a SOAP Envelope.

Constructor Detail

Signer

protected Signer(java.security.PrivateKey key,
                 java.security.cert.Certificate[] certChain)
Constructs an object to sign a SOAP message for SBR. The SOAP message must already have a key.

Parameters:
key - the private key of the signee.
certChain - the certificate chain corresponding to the private key of the signee.

sign

public java.lang.String sign(java.lang.String endpoint,
                             java.lang.String request,
                             SecurityTokenDetails token)
                      throws SBRCoreException
Signs the SBR request.

Parameters:
endpoint - the end point to send to.
request - the request of the signee.
token - The security token details
Returns:
the serialised string.
Throws:
SBRCoreException
